snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes comparing prices for HDMI cables online and at chain retailers, a man who quit social media for a month and artists...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes comparing prices for HDMI cables online and at chain retailers, a man who quit social media for a month and artists celebrating the 25th anniversary of the GIF.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Great Beards and Russian Robots
